agile.name: Agile
agile.description: You have a well-honed and flexible body. You can bend, twist, run and jump with ease.

brutal.name: Brutal
brutal.description: You are capable of taking nearly any action in order to survive.

dexterous.name: Dexterous
dexterous.description: General adroitness and skill involving the use of one's hands.

enduring.name: Enduring
enduring.description: A persistent sturdiness against physical opposition.
uses: When your survival is at stake, this Trait is a good one to risk as a second, or successive, bid.

energetic.name: Energetic
energetic.description: A powerful force of spirit. A strong internal drive propels you and, in physical situations, you can draw on a deep reservoir of enthusiasm and zeal.

ferocious.name: Ferocious
ferocious.description: Possession of brutal intensity and extreme physical determination.
uses: Any time that you intend to do serious harm

graceful.name: Graceful
graceful.description: Control and balance in the motion and use of the entire body.
uses: Whenever you might lose your balance

nimble.name: Nimble
nimble.description: Light and skillful; able to make agile movements.

quick.name: Quick
quick.description: Speedy, with a fast reaction time.

resilient.name: Resilient
resilient.description: Characterized by strength of health; able to recover quickly from bodily harm.
uses: Defending against damage in an attack

robust.name: Robust
robust.description: Resistant to physical harm and damage.
uses: Defending against damage in an attack
Endurance-related actions that could take place over a period of time

rugged.name: Rugged
rugged.description: Hardy, rough and brutally healthy. Able to shrug off wounds and pain to continue struggling.
uses: When resisting damage, any challenge that you enter while injured

stalwart.name: Stalwart
stalwart.description: Physically strong and uncompromising against opposition
uses: Standing your ground against overwhelming odds

steady.name: Steady
steady.description: More than simply physically dependable-controlled, unfaltering and balanced. You have firm mastery over your efforts.

tenacious.name: Tenacious
tenacious.description: Physically determined through force of will.

tireless.name: Tireless
tireless.description: You have a runner's stamina - you are less taxed by physical efforts than ordinary people.
uses: A second or subsequent Physical Challenge with the same foe or foes.

tough.name: Tough
tough.description: A harsh, aggressive attitude and a reluctance to submit.

vigorous.name: Vigorous
vigorous.description: A combination of energy, power, intensity and resistance to harm.
uses: Combat and athletic challenges when you're on the defensive.

clumsy.name: Clumsy
clumsy.description: Lacking physical coordination, balance and grace. You are prone to stumbling and dropping objects.

cowardly.name: Cowardly
cowardly.description: In threatening situations, saving your own neck is all that is important. You might even flee when you have the upper hand, just out of habit.

decrepit.name: Decrepit
decrepit.description: You move and act as if you are old and infirm. You recover from physical damage slowly, you are unable to apply full muscular strength and you tire easily.

delicate.name: Delicate
delicate.description: Frail and weak in structure; you are damaged easily by physical harm.

docile.name: Docile
docile.description: The opposite of the Ferocious and Tenacious Traits. You lack physical persistence, and you tend to submit rather than fighting long battles.

flabby.name: Flabby
flabby.description: Your muscles are underdeveloped. You cannot apply your strength well against resistance.

lame.name: Lame
lame.description: You are disabled in one or more limbs. The handicap can be as obvious as a missing leg or as subtle as a dysfunctional arm.

lethargic.name: Lethargic
lethargic.description: Slow and drowsy. You suffer from a serious lack of energy or motivation

puny.name: Puny
puny.description: You are weak and inferior in strength. This Trait could refer to diminutive size

sickly.name: Sickly
sickly.description: Weak and feeble. Your body responds to physical stress as if it were in the throes of a debilitating illness.

alluring.name: Alluring
alluring.description: An attractive and appealing presence that inspires desire in others.

beguiling.name: Beguiling
beguiling.description: The skill of deception and illusion. You can twist the perceptions of others and lead them to believe what suits you.

charismatic.name: Charismatic
charismatic.description: The talent of inspiration and motivation, the sign of a strong leader.
uses: In a situation involving leadership or the achievement of leadership.

charming.name: Charming
charming.description: Your speech and actions make you attractive and appealing to others.

Commanding.name: commanding
Commanding.description: Impressive delivery of orders and suggestions. This Trait implies skill in the control and direction of others.
uses: When you are seen as a leader.

dignified.name: Dignified
dignified.description: Something about your posture and body carriage appears honorable and aesthetically pleasing. You carry yourself well.

diplomatic.name: Diplomatic
diplomatic.description: Tactful, careful and thoughtful in speech and deed. Few are displeased with what you say or do.

elegant.name: Elegant
elegant.description: Refined tastefulness. Even though you don't need money to be elegant, you exude an air of richness and high society.
uses: Might be important in some clans for advancement

eloquent.name: Eloquent
eloquent.description: The ability to speak in an interesting and convincing manner.

empathetic.name: Empathetic
empathetic.description: Able to identify and understand the emotions and moods of people with whom you come in contact.

expressive.name: Expressive
expressive.description: Able to articulate your thoughts in interesting, meaningful ways.
uses: Any social situation in which you want someone to understand your meaning

friendly.name: Friendly
friendly.description: Able to fit in with everyone you meet. Even after a short conversation, most find it difficult to dislike you.

genial.name: Genial
genial.description: Cordial, kindly, warm and pleasant. You are pleasing to be around.
uses: Generally used in a second or later Social Challenge with someone

gorgeous.name: Gorgeous
gorgeous.description: Beautiful or handsome. You were born with a face and body that is good-looking to most people you meet.

ingratiating.name: Ingratiating
ingratiating.description: Able to gain the favor of people who know you.
uses: Dealing with elders in a social situation

intimidating.name: Intimidating
intimidating.description: A frightening or awesome presence that causes others to feel timid. This Trait is particularly useful when attempting to cow opponents.

magnetic.name: Magnetic
magnetic.description: People feel drawn to you; those around you are interested in your speech and actions.

persuasive.name: Persuasive
persuasive.description: Able to propose believable, convincing and correct arguments and requests. Very useful when someone else is undecided on an issue.

seductive.name: Seductive
seductive.description: Able to entice and tempt. You can use your good looks and your body to get what you want from others.

witty.name: Witty
witty.description: Cleverly humorous. Jokes and jests come easily to you, and you are perceived as a funny person when you want to be

bestial.name: Bestial
bestial.description: You have started to resemble the Beast of your vampiric nature. Maybe you have clawlike fingernails, heavy body hair or a feral glint in your eyes; however your Beast manifests, you definitely seem inhuman.

callous.name: Callous
callous.description: Callous: You are unfeeling, uncaring and insensitive to the suffering of others.

condescending.name: Condescending
condescending.description: You just can't help it; your contempt for others is impossible to hide.

dull.name: Dull
dull.description: Those with whom you speak usually find you boring and uninteresting. Conversing with you is a chore. You do not present yourself well to others.

feral.name: Feral
feral.description: The animalistic predator in you is evident in your actions. You scratch yourself, sniff at people or otherwise behave in a primitive fashion.

naive.name: Naive
naive.description: You lack the air of worldliness, sophistication or maturity that most carry. Obnoxious: You are annoying or unappealing in speech, action or appearance.

repugnant.name: Repugnant
repugnant.description: Your appearance disgusts everyone around you. Needless to say, you make a terrible first impression with strangers.

shy.name: Shy
shy.description: You are timid, bashful, reserved and socially hesitant.

tactless.name: Tactless
tactless.description: You are unable to do or say things that others find appropriate to the social situation.

untrustworthy.name: Untrustworthy
untrustworthy.description: You are rumored or perceived to be unreliable, whether or not you really are.

alert.name: Alert
alert.description: Mentally prepared for danger and able to react quickly when it occurs.

attentive.name: Attentive
attentive.description: You pay attention to everyday occurrences around you. When something extraordinary happens, you are usually ready for it.
uses: Seeing through Obfuscate when you don't expect it

clever.name: Clever
clever.description: Quick-witted resourcefulness. You think well on your feet.
uses: Using a Mental Challenge against another

creative.name: Creative
creative.description: Your ideas are original and imaginative, which implies an ability to produce unusual solutions to your difficulties. You can create artistic pieces. A requirement for any true artist.

cunning.name: Cunning
cunning.description: Crafty and sly, possessing a great deal of ingenuity.

dedicated.name: Dedicated
dedicated.description: You give yourself over totally to your beliefs. When one of your causes is at stake, you stop at nothing to succeed.
uses: Useful in any Mental Challenge when your beliefs are at stake

determined.name: Determined
determined.description: When it comes to mental endeavors, you are fully committed. Nothing can divert your intentions to succeed once you have made up your mind.
uses: Useful in a normal Mental Challenge.

discerning.name: Discerning
discerning.description: Discriminating, able to pick out details, subtleties and idiosyncrasies. You have clarity of vision.

disciplined.name: Disciplined
disciplined.description: Your mind is structured and controlled. This rigidity gives you an edge in battles of will.

insightful.name: Insightful
insightful.description: The power of looking at a situation and gaining an understanding of it.

intuitive.name: Intuitive
intuitive.description: Knowledge and understanding somehow come to you without conscious reasoning, as if by instinct.

knowledgeable.name: Knowledgeable
knowledgeable.description: You know copious and detailed information about a wide variety of topics. This Trait represents "book-learning."
uses: Remembering information your character might know

observant.name: Observant
observant.description: Depth of vision, the power to look at something and notice the important aspects of it.
uses: Picking up on subtleties that others might overlook.

patient.name: Patient
patient.description: Tolerant, persevering and steadfast. You can wait out extended delays with composure.
uses: Mental battles after another Trait has been bid.

rational.name: Rational
rational.description: You believe in logic, reason, sanity and sobriety. Your ability to reduce concepts to a mathematical level helps you analyze the world.
uses: Not used as an initial bid

reflective.name: Reflective
reflective.description: Meditative self-recollection and deep thought. The Trait of the serious thinker, Reflective enables you to consider all aspects of a conundrum.

shrewd.name: Shrewd
shrewd.description: Astute and artful, able to keep your wits about you and accomplish mental feats with efficiency and finesse.

vigilant.name: Vigilant
vigilant.description: Watchful. You have the disposition of a guard dog; your attention misses little
uses: More appropriate for mental defense than for attack

wily.name: Wily
wily.description: Sly and full of guile. Because you are wily, you can trick and deceive easily.

wise.name: Wise
wise.description: An overall understanding of the workings of the world.

forgetful.name: Forgetful
forgetful.description: You have trouble remembering even important things.

gullible.name: Gullible
gullible.description: Easily deceived, duped or fooled. Ignorant: Uneducated or misinformed, never seeming to know anything.

impatient.name: Impatient
impatient.description: Restless, anxious and generally intolerant of delays. You want everything to go your way â€” immediately.

oblivious.name: Oblivious
oblivious.description: Unaware and unmindful. You'd be lucky if you noticed an airplane flying through your living room.

predictable.name: Predictable
predictable.description: Because you lack originality or intelligence, even strangers can figure out what you intend to do next.

shortsighted.name: Shortsighted
shortsighted.description: Lacking foresight. You rarely look beyond the superficial; details of perception are usually lost on you.

submissive.name: Submissive
submissive.description: No backbone; you relent and surrender at any cost rather than stand up for yourself.

violent.name: Violent
violent.description: An extreme lack of self-control. You fly into rages at the slightest provocation, and frenzy is always close to the surface. This Trait is a Mental one because it represents mental instability.

witless.name: Witless
witless.description: Lacking the ability to process information quickly. Foolish and slow to act when threatened.
